metrics.name: Average processing time for purchase orders
metrics.description: Average time from the creation of a purchase order to its acknowledgment
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${ato_po_acknowledgement_events}))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${ato_po_creation_events}))
   )

metrics.name: Average confirmation time for purchase requisitions
metrics.description: Average time needed to confirm a purchase requisition by creating a purchase order
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${ato_po_creation_events}))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${ato_pr_creation_events}))
   )

metrics.name: Goods return rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with delivery returns
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT COUNT(event_name)
			WHERE event_name IN (${ato_return_delivery_events})) > 0
	)
/ COUNT(case_id)
* 100

metrics.name: Average time from purchase order to delivery
metrics.description: Average time from purchase order to goods receipt
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${ato_goods_receipt_events}))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${ato_po_creation_events}))
   )

metrics.name: Process compliance
metrics.description: Percentage of compliant Acquire-to-Onboard cases
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES(${ato_compliant_event_sequence})
	)
/ COUNT(case_id)
* 100

metrics.name: Two-way match rate
metrics.description: Percentage of purchase orders with a two-way match
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (${ato_two_way_match_condition})
	)
/ COUNT(case_id)
* 100

metrics.name: Late deliveries cases
metrics.description: Number of cases with late deliveries. Only cases that have been completely delivered are considered.

metrics.name: Late deliveries rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with late deliveries. Only cases that have been completely delivered are considered.

metrics.name: Average delay of late deliveries
metrics.description: The average delay time of late deliveries. Only cases that have been completely delivered are considered.

metrics.name: On-Time Delivery rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with on-time deliveries. Only cases that have been completely delivered are considered.

metrics.name: Overdue deliveries cases
metrics.description: Number of cases with overdue deliveries. Only cases that have not been (completely) delivered yet are considered.

metrics.name: Overdue deliveries rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with overdue deliveries. Only cases that have not been (completely) delivered yet are considered.

metrics.name: Maverick Buying - Prices Changes after Goods Receipt
metrics.description: Total number of cases with price changes that happened after the Goods Receipt had already been registered
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES(${ato_maverick_buying_price_change_condition})
	)
/ COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Maverick Buying Rate - PO Creation after Invoice Creation
metrics.description: Percentage of cases in which the PO Item was created after the Invoice, a common indicator for Maverick Buying
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES(${ato_maverick_buying_po_after_invoice_condition})
	)
/ COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: POs created after Invoice Creation
metrics.description: Total number of cases in which a PO Item has been created after the Invoice Creation event
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER
	(WHERE (event_name MATCHES(${ato_po_created_after_invoice_created})))

metrics.name: No-touch-order rate
metrics.description: Percentage of no-touch-orders, which are cases that ran without any changes or typical rework events. Automation of events is not considered.
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE NOT (event_name MATCHES ((${ato_change_event_flow}))) AND (event_name MATCHES(${ato_goods_receipt_events}))
	)
/ (COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES(${ato_goods_receipt_events}))
	)
* 100

metrics.name: Invoices waiting for Goods Receipt
metrics.description: Total number of cases with Invoices waiting for the Goods Receipt event
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE NOT (event_name MATCHES(${ato_goods_receipt_events}))
	AND (event_name MATCHES(${ato_invoice_event_flow}))
	)

metrics.name: Perfect order fulfillment rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases that went through without any reversal of Goods Receipts
metrics.signalFragment:
(COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (event_name MATCHES(${ato_goods_receipt_events}))
	)
	-
	COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (event_name MATCHES(${ato_goods_receipt_reversal_events}))
	))
	/
	COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (event_name MATCHES(${ato_goods_receipt_events}))
	)
	* 100

metrics.name: Automation rate for asset creation
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with automated asset creation

metrics.name: Automation rate for invoice creation
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with automated invoice creation

metrics.name: Automation rate for purchase orders creation
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with automated purchase orders creation

metrics.name: Average cycle time asset creation to asset activation
metrics.description: Average cycle time between asset crated and asset capitalization
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Capitalize Asset Item'))) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Asset Item')
)))

metrics.name: Average cycle time purchase order to asset creation
metrics.description: Average cycle time between purchase order creation and asset creation
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
 	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Asset Item')
)) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create PO Item'))))

metrics.name: Average cycle time purchase order to invoice posting
metrics.description: Average cycle time between purchase order creation and invoice posting
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Post FI Invoice'))) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create PO Item'))))

metrics.name: Notification creation automation rate
metrics.description: Percentage of notification items that were created using automation
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "case_id") FILTER (
		WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" IN ('System','Service')
 	AND (event_name = 'Create Notification')))
	))
	/ SUM((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT"case_id") FILTER (
		WHERE event_name = 'Create Notification'
))) * 100

metrics.name: Number of manual notification creations
metrics.description: Number of notification items that were created manually

metrics.name: Order creation automation rate
metrics.description: Percentage of order items that were created using automation
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "case_id") FILTER (
		WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" IN ('System','Service')
		AND (event_name = 'Create Maintenance Order')))
	))
/ SUM((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "case_id") FILTER (
		WHERE event_name = 'Create Maintenance Order'
))) * 100

metrics.name: Number of manual order creations
metrics.description: Number of maintenance order items that were created manually

metrics.name: Manual notification changes rate
metrics.description: Percentage of notification items that were changed manually
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "Unique Event Id") FILTER (
		WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" IN ('Dialog')
		AND (event_name LIKE 'Change Notification%')))
	))
/ SUM((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "Unique Event Id") FILTER (
		WHERE event_name LIKE 'Change Notification%')
)) * 100

metrics.name: Number of manual notification item changes
metrics.description: Number of notification items that were changed manually
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "Unique Event Id") FILTER (
		WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" IN ('Dialog')
		AND (event_name LIKE 'Change Notification%'))))

metrics.name: Manual order changes rate
metrics.description: Percentage of order items that were changed manually
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "Unique Event Id") FILTER (
		WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" IN ('Dialog')
		AND (event_name LIKE 'Change MO%')))
	))
	/ SUM((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "Unique Event Id") FILTER (
		WHERE event_name LIKE 'Change MO%')
)) * 100

metrics.name: Number of manual order item changes
metrics.description: Number of order items that were changed manually
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "Unique Event Id") FILTER (
		WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" IN ('Dialog')
		AND (event_name LIKE 'Change MO%'))))

metrics.name: Automation rate over cases
metrics.description: Number of automated events divided by all events
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM(
	(SELECT COUNT(event_name) FILTER (
		WHERE (${automation_condition}))
	)
	)
/ SUM((SELECT COUNT(event_name)))
* 100

metrics.name: Automation rate potential
metrics.description: Percentage of events that could be automated
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM(
	(SELECT COUNT(event_name) FILTER (
		WHERE (${automation_potential_condition}))
	)
	)
/ SUM((SELECT COUNT(event_name)))
* 100

metrics.name: Automation rate over events
metrics.description: Number of automated events divided by all events
metrics.signalFragment:
count(event_name) FILTER 
(WHERE (${automation_condition})) 
/ count(event_name) * 100

metrics.name: Average number of changes per case
metrics.description: Average number of change events per case
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ${ueid}) FILTER (
		WHERE event_name ILIKE ${change_events})))

metrics.name: Percentage of change events per case
metrics.description: Average percentage of change events per case

metrics.name: Percentage of cases with changes
metrics.description: Percentage of cases that contain change events
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT BOOL_OR(event_name ILIKE ${change_events})))
/ COUNT(case_id)
* 100

metrics.name: Percentage of cases with manual changes
metrics.description: Percentage of cases that contain change events executed manually
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT BOOL_OR(event_name ILIKE ${change_events}) AND BOOL_OR(${manual_changes_condition})))
/ COUNT(case_id)
* 100

metrics.name: Conformance level
metrics.description: Percentage of cases without conformance issues
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES(${conformance_condition})) 
/ COUNT(case_id) 
* 100

metrics.name: Non-conformant cases
metrics.description: Total number of non-conformant cases
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE NOT (event_name MATCHES(${conformance_condition})))

metrics.name: Cases at compliance risk
metrics.description: Number of cases that might face penalty due to compliance violation

metrics.name: Average cycle time
metrics.description: Average cycle time calculated from the first to the last event

metrics.name: Median cycle time
metrics.description: Median cycle time calculated from the first to the last event
metrics.signalFragment: MEDIAN((SELECT LAST(end_time)) - (SELECT FIRST(end_time)))

metrics.name: Average custom cycle time
metrics.description: Average cycle time between two events of interest to the user
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name ILIKE ${end_events})))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN (${start_events}))))
   )

metrics.name: Average cycle time for open cases
metrics.description: Average cycle time for all currently open cases
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) - FIRST(end_time))) FILTER (
		WHERE (SELECT FIRST(event_name) FILTER (
			WHERE event_name IN (${closing_events}))) IS NULL
   )

metrics.name: Difference between planned and actual average cycle time
metrics.description: Comparison between planned and actual average cycle time: when > 1 then the actual cycle time is smaller than that planned

metrics.name: Percentage of cases executed in less than a given time
metrics.description: Percentage of cases executed in less than a given time threshold

metrics.name: Number of dropouts
metrics.description: Number of cases that were started and not successfully completed

metrics.name: Dropout rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases that were started and not successfully completed
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT LAST(event_name) IN (${dropout_events})))
/ COUNT(case_id)
* 100

metrics.name: Number of idle cases
metrics.description: Number of cases that are open long enough to qualify as dropouts

metrics.name: Amount of time spent on dropouts
metrics.description: Total cycle time of all cases until the last event before dropout
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time)) - (SELECT FIRST(end_time))) FILTER (
		WHERE (SELECT LAST(event_name) IN (${dropout_events}))
   )

metrics.name: Total overdue invoice amounts
metrics.description: Sum of all invoice amounts that are overdue (converted in USD)
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM(${itc_ecc_s4h_amount_conv}) FILTER(
	 WHERE (${itc_ecc_s4h_clearing_date} IS NULL)
		AND ${itc_ecc_s4h_due_date} < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW())
	)

metrics.name: Number of open overdue invoices
metrics.description: Number of invoices that are currently open and overdue
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (${itc_ecc_s4h_clearing_date} IS NULL)
		AND ${itc_ecc_s4h_due_date} < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW())
)

metrics.name: Average time invoice creation to invoice clearing
metrics.description: Average time from invoice creation to invoice clearing within a reference period
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(${itc_ecc_s4h_clearing_date}) 
		WHERE ((NOW() - LAST(end_time)) < DURATION ${itc_ecc_s4h_invoice_clearing_period}))
	-(SELECT LAST(${itc_ecc_s4h_posting_date})
		WHERE ((NOW() - LAST(end_time)) < DURATION ${itc_ecc_s4h_invoice_posting_period}))
	)

metrics.name: Average time post goods issue to invoice creation
metrics.description: Average time from posting goods issue to invoice creation
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) 
	WHERE event_name IN (${itc_ecc_s4h_invoice_creation_events})) 
	-
	(SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
	WHERE event_name IN (${itc_ecc_s4h_shipping_events}))
)

metrics.name: No payment rate
metrics.description: Percentage of overdue invoices from all open invoices
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT (case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (${itc_ecc_s4h_clearing_date} IS NULL AND ${itc_ecc_s4h_due_date} < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()))
	)
/ COUNT (case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE (${itc_ecc_s4h_clearing_date} IS NULL)) * 100

metrics.name: Dunning rate
metrics.description: Percentage of invoices that were dunned

metrics.name: Automation rate for invoice clearing
metrics.description: Percentage of automated invoice clearing events

metrics.name: Duration of dunning blocks
metrics.description: Average lead time from setting a dunning block to removing the last dunning block
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER 
		(WHERE event_name IN (${itc_ecc_s4h_remove_dunning_block_events})))
	-
	(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER
		(WHERE event_name IN (${itc_ecc_s4h_set_dunning_block_events})))
)

metrics.name: Days Sales Outstanding (DSO)
metrics.description: Average number of days to collect revenue, weighted by the invoice value
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG((
	(SELECT LAST(${itc_ecc_s4h_clearing_date})) 
		- (SELECT FIRST(${itc_ecc_s4h_posting_date})))
	*(SELECT LAST(${itc_ecc_s4h_amount_conv}))
)

metrics.name: Late payment rate
metrics.description: Percentage of invoices that were cleared 1 day after their due dates

metrics.name: Early payment rate
metrics.description: Percentage of invoices that were cleared more than 5 days before their due dates

metrics.name: On-time payment rate
metrics.description: Percentage of invoices that were cleared less than 5 days before and no later than 1 day after their due dates

metrics.name: No-Touch invoice processing rate
metrics.description: Percentage of invoices with no change events
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE NOT (event_name MATCHES((${itc_ecc_s4h_no_touch_condition}))) 
		AND (event_name MATCHES(${itc_ecc_s4h_clear_invoice_events}))
)
/ (COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES(${itc_ecc_s4h_clear_invoice_events}))
	)
* 100

metrics.name: Invoices without billing doc from SO
metrics.description: Invoices without Billing Document from Sales Order

COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES(${itc_ecc_s4h_invoice_reversal_events}))

COUNT(case_id)
* 100

COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES(${itc_ecc_s4h_change_baseline_date})

/
COUNT(case_id)
* 100

metrics.name: Average accounts receivable documents creation to clearing time
metrics.description: Average time from accounts receivable documents creation to clearing
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM("AR_AVGClearingDays" * "AR_CountClearedDocuments")
/
SUM("AR_CountClearedDocuments")

metrics.name: Average net payment terms
metrics.description: Average net payment terms in days

SUM("AR_AVGNetDueDateDays" * "AR_CountDocuments")
/
SUM("AR_CountDocuments")

metrics.name: Average payment delay
metrics.description: Average delay of payments in days

SUM("AR_AVGClearingAfterNetDueDays" * "AR_CountClearedDocuments")
/
SUM("AR_CountClearedDocuments")

metrics.name: Billing request (DMR) rejection rate

(
SUM("BillingRequest_RejectedCount")
/
SUM("BillingRequest_TotalCount")
)
 * 100

metrics.description: Percentage of automated invoice clearing events

metrics.name: Average time from invoice creation to its clearing within a certain time frame
metrics.description: Average time from invoice creation to invoice clearing within a reference period
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(${i2c_s4hc_clearing_date}) 
		WHERE ((NOW() - LAST(end_time)) < DURATION ${i2c_s4hc_invoice_clearing_period}))
	-(SELECT LAST(${i2c_s4hc_posting_date})
		WHERE ((NOW() - LAST(end_time)) < DURATION ${i2c_s4hc_invoice_posting_period}))
	)

metrics.name: Days sales outstanding (DSO)
metrics.description: Average number of days to collect revenue, weighted by the invoice value
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG((
	(SELECT LAST(${i2c_s4hc_clearing_date})) 
		- (SELECT FIRST(${i2c_s4hc_posting_date})))
	* (SELECT LAST(${i2c_s4hc_amount_conv}))
)

 COUNT(case_id)

END

metrics.description: Number of production orders whose scheduled finish date is more than a specified period in the past, and the final confirmation has not yet been posted

metrics.name: Missing parts in production order not yet released
metrics.description: Number of not yet released production orders which were created in a selected time period that have missing parts resulting from the ATP check
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT( case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE ( SELECT COUNT(event_name)
            WHERE (${mots_prod_order_item_status} IN (${mots_prod_orders_released}))
    ) = 0
    AND ${mots_missing_parts_in_prod_orders} IS NOT NULL
    AND ( NOW() - ( SELECT LAST(end_time)
		  WHERE event_name IN (${mots_prod_order_creation_events}) ) 
          <= DURATION ${mots_not_released_prod_orders_reference_period})
)

metrics.name: Average time from production order creation to delivery
metrics.description: Average lead time from 'Create Production Order Item' event to 'Create Outbound Delivery Item' event

metrics.name: Automated production orders with reference to planned orders creation rate
metrics.description: Percentage of automated production orders creation events with reference to planned orders

metrics.name: Accepted usage decisions rate
metrics.description: Percentage of accepted usage decisions
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
 WHERE
 (SELECT COUNT(event_name) WHERE ("UD Code"='A')) > 0
	 AND event_name MATCHES ('Create Usage Decision')
)/
 COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	 WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create Usage Decision'))*100

metrics.name: Result recording cycle time
metrics.description: Time from begin to complete result recording
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER(
	WHERE event_name = 'Complete Result Recording'))
	-
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER(
	WHERE event_name='Begin Result Recording'))
	)

metrics.name: Cases with free and restricted material movement
metrics.description: Number of cases with both free and restricted material movement
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
 WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Material Movement Free')
 AND EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Material Movement Restricted'))

metrics.name: Result recording to usage decision lead time
metrics.description: Time from complete result recording to create usage decision
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER(
	WHERE event_name='Create Usage Decision'))
	-
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER(
	WHERE event_name = 'Complete Result Recording'))
	)

metrics.name: Free material movement rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with free material movement
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT (event_name) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name IN ('Material Movement Free')
 )
/
COUNT (event_name) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name ILIKE 'Material Movement%'
)
*100

metrics.name: Rejected usage decisions rate
metrics.description: Percentage of rejected usage decisions
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
 WHERE
(SELECT COUNT(event_name) WHERE ("UD Code" = 'R')) > 0
	 AND event_name MATCHES ('Create Usage Decision')
) /
  COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	 WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create Usage Decision'))*100

metrics.name: Restricted material movement rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with restricted material movement
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT (event_name) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name IN ('Material Movement Restricted')
 )
 /
COUNT (event_name) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name ILIKE 'Material Movement%'
)
*100

metrics.name: Automation rate material movement
metrics.description: Percentage of automated material movement events
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM((SELECT
	COUNT(event_name) FILTER (
		WHERE ((${itq_automation_condition})
		AND event_name ILIKE 'Material Movement%'
	)))) / 
SUM((SELECT
	COUNT(event_name) FILTER (
    	WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" IS NOT NULL)
		AND event_name ILIKE 'Material Movement%'))
) * 100

metrics.name: Automation rate usage decision
metrics.description: Percentage of automated usage decision creation events
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM((SELECT COUNT(event_name) FILTER (
		WHERE (${itq_automation_condition})
	)))
/ 
SUM((SELECT COUNT(event_name) FILTER (
		WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" IS NOT NULL)))
) * 100

metrics.name: Delayed inspections rate
metrics.description: Percentage inspection with planned inspection end date before usage decision date
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
 WHERE ("Planned Inspection End Date"<
			(SELECT LAST(END_TIME) FILTER (
	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Usage Decision'))
			)))
 	/ COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE event_name MATCHES('Create Usage Decision'))*100

metrics.name: Number of delayed inspections
metrics.description: Number of cases where create usage decision accrued after the planned inspection end date
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
WHERE ("Planned Inspection End Date"<
	  (SELECT LAST(END_TIME) FILTER (
 WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Usage Decision')))))

metrics.name: Average cycle time of delayed inspections
metrics.description: Average cycle time of cases where usage decision accrued after the planned Inspection end date
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
		(SELECT LAST(END_TIME) FILTER (
 		 WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Usage Decision')))
			-"Planned Inspection End Date"
	) FILTER(
	  		WHERE("Planned Inspection End Date"<
				(SELECT LAST(END_TIME) FILTER (
 		WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Usage Decision'))
	)))

metrics.name: Production quantity accuracy
metrics.description: Rate between total process order quantities and total goods receipt quantities
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	"Produced Delivered Quantity"/"Total Order Quantity")
	FILTER(WHERE "Delivery Completed" IS NOT NULL)
*100

metrics.name: Process orders specific status
metrics.description: Total process orders with a specific status
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(event_name)
	FILTER(WHERE event_name MATCHES(${mts_po_status_event_name}))

metrics.name: Process orders without planned orders
metrics.description: Total process orders created without planned order reference
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id)
	FILTER(WHERE "Planned Order Number" IS NULL)

metrics.name: Planning rate
metrics.description: Process orders with planned order reference and total process orders
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id)
	FILTER(WHERE "Planned Order Number" IS NOT NULL)
/ 
COUNT(case_id)
*100

metrics.name: Number of goods receipts
metrics.description: Total number of single goods receipt postings
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM((
	SELECT COUNT(event_name)
	FILTER(WHERE event_name LIKE 'GR%')))

metrics.name: Automation rate for specific event
metrics.description: Automation rate for a specific event
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM(
	(SELECT COUNT(event_name)
	FILTER (
		WHERE ((${mts_automation_condition})
		AND event_name IN (${mts_automation_event_name})))))
/ SUM(
	(SELECT COUNT(event_name)
	FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN (${mts_automation_event_name})))))
*100

metrics.name: Process orders overdue for release
metrics.description: Process orders where the scheduled release date is in the past and the actual release date is pending
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id)
	FILTER (WHERE "Scheduled Release Date" < NOW()
	AND "Actual Release Date" IS NULL)

metrics.name: Process orders overdue for delivery
metrics.description: Process orders where the scheduled finish date is in the past and the actual delivery date is pending
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id)
	FILTER (WHERE "Scheduled Finish Date" < NOW()
	AND "Actual Delivery Date" IS NULL)

metrics.name: Start date: difference scheduled and actual date
metrics.description: Average difference of the scheduled start date minus the actual start date
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
"Scheduled Start Date" - "Actual Start Date")

metrics.name: Finish date: difference scheduled and actual date
metrics.description: Average difference of the scheduled finish date minus the actual finish date
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
"Scheduled Finish Date" - "Actual Finish Date")

metrics.name: Release date: difference scheduled and actual date
metrics.description: Average difference of the scheduled release date minus the actual release date
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
"Scheduled Release Date" - "Actual Release Date")

metrics.name: Late delivery rate
metrics.description: Percentage of late delivered orders from total orders
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE "Actual Delivery Date" IS NOT NULL
	AND ("Actual Delivery Date" - "Scheduled Finish Date" > DURATION '0days'))
/
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE "Actual Delivery Date" IS NOT NULL)
*100

metrics.name: Early delivery rate
metrics.description: Percentage of early delivered orders from total orders
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE "Actual Delivery Date" IS NOT NULL
	AND ("Actual Delivery Date" - "Scheduled Finish Date" < DURATION '0days')
	)
/
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE"Actual Delivery Date" IS NOT NULL)
*100

metrics.name: On-time delivery rate
metrics.description: Percentage of on-time delivered orders from total orders
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE "Actual Delivery Date" IS NOT NULL
	AND "Actual Delivery Date" - "Scheduled Finish Date" = DURATION '0days'
	)
/
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE "Actual Delivery Date" IS NOT NULL)
*100

metrics.name: Order release lead time
metrics.description: Time from order creation to order release
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER(
	WHERE event_name = 'Released'))
	-
(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER(
	WHERE event_name = 'Create Process Order'))
	)

metrics.name: Order confirmation lead time
metrics.description: Time from order release to order confirmation
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER(
	WHERE event_name = 'Confirmed'))
	-
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER(
	WHERE event_name = 'Released'))
	)

metrics.name: Manufacturing lead time
metrics.description: Time from order release to order receipt
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER(
	WHERE event_name LIKE 'GR%'))
	-
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER(
	WHERE event_name = 'Released'))
	)

metrics.name: % of ODO Items fully shipped
metrics.description: Percentage of Outbound Delivery Order Items where ODO quantity was fully shipped (GI quantity)
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT (DISTINCT (CASE 
WHEN "ODO Item Quantity"="Total GI Quantity" THEN "case_id" 
ELSE NULL
END)) 
/
COUNT (distinct "case_id")
*100

metrics.name: % of ODO items not fully shipped
metrics.description: Percentage of Outbound Delivery Order Items where ODO quantity matches GI quantity - ODO Item is fully shipped
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT (DISTINCT (CASE 
WHEN "ODO Item Quantity"="Total GI Quantity" THEN NULL 
WHEN "ODO Item Quantity"<"Total GI Quantity" THEN NULL 
ELSE "case_id" 
END)) 
/
COUNT (distinct "case_id")
*100

metrics.name: % of ODO items overdelivered
metrics.description: Percentage of Outbound Delivery Order Items where a higher quantity was delivered than ordered
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT (DISTINCT (CASE 
WHEN "ODO Item Quantity"="Total GI Quantity" THEN NULL 
WHEN "ODO Item Quantity">"Total GI Quantity" THEN NULL 
ELSE "case_id" 
END)) 
/
COUNT (distinct "case_id")
*100

metrics.name: % of ODO Items w/o Picking WTs
metrics.description: Percentage of Outbound Delivery Order Items without the Warehouse Task "Picking"
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(
CASE WHEN
(SELECT COUNT(event_name)
WHERE (event_name = 'Create Warehouse Task' 
AND "WT Activity Type" = 'PICK')) = 0 
THEN Null
ELSE case_id
END)
/
COUNT(case_id)
*100

metrics.name: % of ODO Items w/o WTs
metrics.description: Percentage of Outbound Delivery Order Items that don't have any Warehouse Tasks created
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(
CASE WHEN event_name MATCHES('Create Warehouse Task') THEN null
ELSE case_id
END)
/
COUNT(case_id)
*100

metrics.name: % of ODO Items with completed WTs
metrics.description: Percentage of Outbound Delivery Order Items where all WTs are confirmed
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(
CASE WHEN
(SELECT COUNT(event_name)
WHERE (event_name = 'Create Warehouse Task')) > 0
AND
(SELECT COUNT(event_name)
WHERE (event_name = 'Create Warehouse Task' )) =
(SELECT COUNT(event_name)
WHERE (event_name = 'Confirm Warehouse Task')) 
THEN case_id
ELSE Null
END)
/
COUNT(case_id)
*100

metrics.name: % of ODO Items with partially completed WTs
metrics.description: Percentage of Outbound Delivery Order Items where not all WTs are confirmed
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(
CASE WHEN
(SELECT COUNT(event_name)
WHERE (event_name = 'Create Warehouse Task' )) >
(SELECT COUNT(event_name)
WHERE (event_name = 'Confirm Warehouse Task')) 
THEN case_id
ELSE Null
END)
/
COUNT(case_id)
*100

metrics.name: % of ODO Items with Picking WTs completed
metrics.description: Percentage of Outbound Delivery Items where all "Picking" Warehouse Tasks are completed
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(
CASE WHEN
(SELECT COUNT(event_name)
WHERE (event_name = 'Create Warehouse Task'
AND "WT Activity Type" = 'PICK')) > 0
AND
(SELECT COUNT(event_name)
WHERE (event_name = 'Create Warehouse Task' 
AND "WT Activity Type" = 'PICK')) =
(SELECT COUNT(event_name)
WHERE (event_name = 'Confirm Warehouse Task'
AND "WT Activity Type" = 'PICK')) 
THEN case_id
ELSE Null
END)
/
COUNT(case_id)
*100

metrics.name: % of ODO Items with Picking WTs Completed w/o Goods Issue posted
metrics.description: Percentage of ODO Items with Picking completed without Goods Issue posted
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(
CASE WHEN
(SELECT COUNT(event_name)
WHERE (event_name = 'Create Warehouse Task'
AND "WT Activity Type" = 'PICK')) > 0
AND
(SELECT COUNT(event_name)
WHERE (event_name = 'Create Warehouse Task' 
AND "WT Activity Type" = 'PICK')) =
(SELECT COUNT(event_name)
WHERE (event_name = 'Confirm Warehouse Task' 
AND "WT Activity Type" = 'PICK')) 
AND 
(SELECT COUNT(event_name)
WHERE (event_name = 'Post Goods Issue')) = 0
THEN case_id
ELSE Null
END)
/ 
COUNT(case_id)
*100

metrics.name: % of ODO Items with Picking WTs partially completed
metrics.description: Percentage of Outbound Delivery Items where not all "Picking" Warehouse Tasks are completed
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(
CASE WHEN
(SELECT COUNT(event_name)
WHERE (event_name = 'Create Warehouse Task' 
AND "WT Activity Type" = 'PICK')) >
(SELECT COUNT(event_name)
WHERE (event_name = 'Confirm Warehouse Task'
AND "WT Activity Type" = 'PICK'))
THEN case_id
ELSE Null
END)
/
COUNT(case_id)
*100

metrics.name: % of ODOs w/o WTs
metrics.description: Percentage of Outbound Delivery Orders that don't have any Warehouse Tasks created
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT (distinct (CASE WHEN event_name MATCHES('Create Warehouse Task') THEN null
ELSE "ODO Document Number" 
END)) 
/
COUNT (distinct "ODO Document Number")
*100

metrics.name: Median Cycle Time: ODO Item Creation and (last) WT completion
metrics.description: Median Cycle Time for goods from Outbound Delivery Orders creation to the last Warehouse Task completion
metrics.signalFragment:
MEDIAN(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN ('Confirm Warehouse Task')
		)
	-(SELECT LAST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN ('Create Outbound Delivery Order Item')
))

metrics.name: Median Cycle Time: ODO Item Creation to (first) WT Creation
metrics.description: Median Cycle Time for goods from Outbound Delivery Order Items creation to the first Warehouse Task creation

metrics.name: Outstanding Revenue
metrics.description: Amount of Revenue outstanding due to Items not shipped
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM ( (CASE 
WHEN "ODO Item Quantity"="Total GI Quantity" THEN NULL 
WHEN "ODO Item Quantity"< "Total GI Quantity" THEN NULL
ELSE 
(CASE WHEN "SO Item Document Number" IS NULL THEN NULL
ELSE ("ODO Item Quantity"-"Total GI Quantity")*("SO Item Net Value in Document Currency"/"SO Item Quantity Ordered") END)

END))

metrics.name: Potential Revenue
metrics.description: Revenue of ODO Items to be shipped
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM(CASE WHEN "SO Item Document Number" IS NULL THEN NULL
WHEN "SO Item Quantity Ordered" IS NULL OR "SO Item Quantity Ordered"=0 THEN NULL
ELSE  ("ODO Item Quantity")*("SO Item Net Value in Document Currency"/"SO Item Quantity Ordered") END)

metrics.name: Revenue
metrics.description: Revenue of ODO Items shipped
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM (
CASE WHEN "SO Item Document Number" IS NULL THEN NULL
WHEN "SO Item Quantity Ordered" IS NULL OR "SO Item Quantity Ordered"=0 THEN NULL
ELSE ("Total GI Quantity")*("SO Item Net Value in Document Currency"/"SO Item Quantity Ordered")
END
)

metrics.name: Carrier Change Rate
metrics.description: Rate of Freight Orders that have a carrier change
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) 
	FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Change Carrier')
	)
/
COUNT(case_id) 
*100

metrics.name: Carrier Rejection Rate
metrics.description: Rate of Freight Orders that were rejected by Carrier
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) 
	FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Freight Order Rejected by Vendor')
	)
/
COUNT(case_id) 
*100

metrics.name: Freight Settlement Cancellation Rate
metrics.description: Rate of Freight Settlements that were cancelled
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) 
	FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Cancel Settlement')
	)
/
COUNT(case_id) 
*100

metrics.name: Late Delivery Rate
metrics.description: Rate of Freight Order that were executed a defined period of time after the defined delivery date
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(WHERE
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER
    (WHERE event_name IN ('Confirm Execution Done')))
	- "FRO Delivery Date"
	> DURATION ${late_delivery_duration}
    AND "FRO Delivery Status" = '03')
/ 
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE "FRO Delivery Status" = '03')

metrics.name: Med. Cycle Time FRO Confirmation by Vendor
metrics.description: Median Cycle Time from Send Freight Order to Vendor to Freight Order Confirmed by Vendor

metrics.name: Med. Cycle Time FRO Creation to Execution Cancellation
metrics.description: Median Cycle Time Freight Order Creation to Cancel Execution

metrics.name: Med. Cycle Time FRO Creation to FSD Creation
metrics.description: Median Cycle Time Freight Order Creation to Freight Settlement Document Creation

metrics.name: Med. Cycle Time FSD Creation to Cancel Settlement
metrics.description: Median Cycle Time Freight Settlement Document Creation to Cancel Settlement

metrics.name: Number of Cases with Process Continuation after Cancellation
metrics.description: Number of cases with events happening after a cancellation event
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT( case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Cancel Freight Order (Tech.)') 
    AND NOT EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Cancel Freight Order (Tech.)'$)
    OR (EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Cancel Execution') 
	AND NOT EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Cancel Execution'$))
	OR (EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Cancel Settlement') 
	AND NOT EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Cancel Settlement'$))
)

metrics.name: Freight Order Cancellation (Tech.) Rate
metrics.description: Rate of Freight Orders that were technically cancelled
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) 
	FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Cancel Freight Order (Tech.)')
	)
/
COUNT(case_id) 
*100

metrics.name: Freight Order Execution Cancellation Rate
metrics.description: Rate of Freight Orders that were cancelled during execution
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) 
	FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Cancel Execution')
	)
/
COUNT(case_id) 
*100

metrics.name: Freight Orders executed on time
metrics.description: Number of Freight Orders that were executed on or before the defined delivery date
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(WHERE
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER
	    (WHERE event_name IN ('Confirm Execution Done')))
		-"FRO Delivery Date" <= DURATION ${late_delivery_duration}
	AND "FRO Delivery Status" = '03')

metrics.name: Orders Manufactured On Time
metrics.description: Orders Manufactured On Time
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(distinct "case_id") FILTER (WHERE
"Order Actual Start" <= "Order Planned Start" AND
"Order Actual Completion" <= "Order Planned Completion")

metrics.name: Average Cycle Time for Routing Step
metrics.description: Average time between Start and Complete of a certain Routing step
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ((SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME LIKE ${routing_step_end})) - (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME LIKE ${routing_step_start})))

metrics.name: Average Time from Production Order to Goods Receipt
metrics.description: Average Time from Production Order to Goods Receipt
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Goods Receipt'))) - (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Production Order'))))

metrics.name: Completed Orders
metrics.description: Production order deliveries status – 100% completed
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (where
"Order Execution Status" ='COMPLETED')

metrics.name: Delayed Time at Order start
metrics.description: Average difference between actual start and scheduled start of order
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG ("Order Actual Start" - "Order Scheduled Start") 
FILTER (WHERE "Order Actual Start" - "Order Scheduled Start" > DURATION '0minutes')

metrics.name: Number of Orders Delayed in Completion
metrics.description: Number of orders where the completion is delayed
metrics.signalFragment:
count(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE "Order Actual Start" IS NOT NULL
	AND "Order Actual Completion" - "Order Scheduled Completion" > DURATION '0minutes')

metrics.name: Number of Orders Delayed in Start
metrics.description: Number of orders where the actual start is delayed
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (WHERE "Order Actual Start" IS NOT NULL AND "Order Actual Start" - "Order Scheduled Start" > DURATION '0minutes')

metrics.name: Time from Production Order to SFC Creation
metrics.description: Avg Time taken from Production Order creation to Shop Floor Control creation
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name = ('Create Shop Floor Control Unit'))))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name = ('Create Production Order'))))
   )

metrics.name: Work in Progress Time
metrics.description: Average time between completion of one step and start of the next step
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
    	FILTER( WHERE ${step_end_condition}))
- (SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
    	FILTER( WHERE ${step_start_condition}))
)

metrics.name: First Pass Yield Rate
metrics.description: SFC Build Quantity that don't have NC logged against total SFC GR Quantity
metrics.signalFragment: SUM ("SFC Build Quantity") FILTER (WHERE "SFC Routing Type" != 'NC') / SUM ("SFC Received Quantity")

metrics.name: Partially Completed Orders
metrics.description: Orders that are not completed and GR quantity is available
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (WHERE 
"Order Execution Status"!='COMPLETED' AND "Order Received Quantity" > 0)

metrics.name: Number of Nonconformances
metrics.description: Total Number of all reported Nonconformances
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT (CASE_ID)
FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES (LIKE 'Report%Nonconformance'))

metrics.name: Statistical forecast quantity error rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases in a certain period in the past where Statistical Forecast Quantity Error is above 30%

metrics.name: Statistical forecast quantity bias rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases in a certain period where Statistical Forecast Quantity Bias is above 10% or less then -10%

metrics.name: Percentage of products without forecast
metrics.description: Percentage of products which could not be forecasted by the forecasting algorithm
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(DISTINCT("Product ID")) FILTER(
	WHERE (
		SELECT SUM("Statistical Fcst Qty") = 0
	)
AND "Material Type ID" = 'FERT'
)
/
COUNT(DISTINCT ("Product ID")) FILTER(
	WHERE "Material Type ID" = 'FERT'
)
* 100

metrics.name: Percentage of products with unconsumed forecast
metrics.description: Percentage of products with an open forecast in a certain period

metrics.name: Combinations over or under forecasted
metrics.description: Number of combinations which are constantly being over or under forecasted

metrics.name: Products with manually changed sales history
metrics.description: Number of products for which sales history was changed manually by planners for a certain period

metrics.name: Percentage of products with considerable forecast override
metrics.description: Percentage of products for which the difference between statistical forecast and final consensus demand is considerable in a certain period

metrics.name: Percentage of products not touched by IO
metrics.description: Percentage of products not part of any Inventory Optimization run in a certain period

metrics.name: Products without inventory plan
metrics.description: Number of products for which there is no safety stock planned in a certain period

metrics.name: Inventory override rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases where the inventory was overwritten by a planner in the current planning cycle
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN ('Finalize Inventory Plan'))
		> (SELECT FIRST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN ('Run Inventory Optimization'))
	)
	AND DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()) = "MONTH"
)
/
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE "MONTH" >= (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()))
	AND ("MONTH" - DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW())) < DURATION ${affected_periods_in_the_future}
) * 100

metrics.name: Overstocking rate
metrics.description: Percentage of combinations in the current planning cycle with more Stock on Hand than the target
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(CASE_ID) FILTER(
	WHERE "Inventory Target" > 0 
	AND "Stock on Hand" > "Inventory Target"	
	AND DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()) = "MONTH"
)
/
COUNT(CASE_ID) FILTER(
	WHERE DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()) = "MONTH"
) * 100

metrics.name: Sales forecast override rate
metrics.description: Percentage of combinations where the sales forecast was overwritten manually by a planner

metrics.name: Market forecast override rate
metrics.description: Percentage of combinations where the market forecast was overwritten manually by a planner

metrics.name: Understocking rate
metrics.description: Percentage of combinations in the current planning cycle with less Stock on Hand than the target
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE ("Inventory Target" > "Stock on Hand") 
	AND DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()) = "MONTH"
)
/
COUNT(CASE_ID) FILTER(
	WHERE DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()) = "MONTH"
) * 100

metrics.name: Capacity over-utilization
metrics.description: Number of combinations with capacity utilization is more than 100% in a certain period

metrics.name: Demand unfulfilled rate
metrics.description: Percentage of products with consensus demand higher than the delivered in a certain period

metrics.name: Percentage of products not touched by supply planning
metrics.description: Percentage of products not part of any supply operator execution in a certain period

metrics.name: Not planning relevant products
metrics.description: Number of products which are not relevant for supply chain planning

metrics.name: Percentage of products with not efficient planning
metrics.description: Percentage of products in the current month where consensus demand was adjusted/changed after supply planning run
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN ('Create Consensus Demand'))
	> (SELECT FIRST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN ('Run Supply Heuristics / Optimizer'))
	)
	AND DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()) = "MONTH"
)
/
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE "Consensus Demand Plan Qty" > 0
	AND "MONTH" >= (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()))
	AND ("MONTH" - DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW())) < DURATION ${affected_periods_in_the_future}
) * 100

metrics.name: Significant products with no statistical forecast
metrics.description: Number of combinations with ABC/XYZ segmentation based analysis of top selling products for forecasting process
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE "ABC Id" IN ('A','B') 
	AND "XYZ Id" IN ('X','Y') 
	AND "Statistical Fcst Qty" = 0
)

metrics.name: Significant products with no inventory plan
metrics.description: Number of combinations with ABC/XYZ segmentation based analysis of top selling products for inventory management
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE "ABC Id" IN ('A','B') 
	AND "XYZ Id" IN ('X','Y') 
	AND "Inventory Target" = 0
	AND "MONTH" >= (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()))
	AND ("MONTH" - DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW())) < DURATION ${affected_periods_in_the_future}
)

metrics.name: Cycle time of reconciliation review
metrics.description: Average time taken from 'Start Reconciliation review' to 'Complete Reconciliation review'
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG ((SELECT AVG (END_TIME) FILTER (
	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Complete Reconciliation review')
	AND "Step Status" = 'COMPLETED')) 
)
-
AVG ((SELECT AVG (END_TIME) FILTER (
	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Start Reconciliation review')
	AND "Step Status" = 'COMPLETED')) 
)

)
-

	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Start Management review')
	AND "Step Status" = 'COMPLETED')) 
)

metrics.name: Cycle time of demand planning

)
-
AVG ((SELECT AVG (END_TIME) FILTER (
	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Start Demand Planning')
	AND "Step Status" = 'COMPLETED'))

metrics.name: Perfect demand fulfillment rate
metrics.description: Percentage of combinations in a certain period with consensus demand delivered equal to consensus demand

metrics.name: Percentage of Hired Candidates
metrics.description: Percentage of job applications that result in a hiring event

COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT COUNT(event_name)
		WHERE event_name IN (${hiring_events}))
	> 0)
/ COUNT(case_id)
* 100

metrics.name: Number of Hired Candidates
metrics.description: Number of job applications that result in a hiring event
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT COUNT(event_name)
		WHERE event_name IN (${hiring_events}))
	> 0)

metrics.name: Average Time to Hire
metrics.description: Average Time Between Job Application Received and Candidate Hired
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN (${hiring_events}))))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN (${job_application_creation_events}))))
)

metrics.name: Average Time to Fill
metrics.description: Average Time Between Job Requisition Created and Position Filled
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN (${hiring_events}))))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN (${job_requisition_creation_events}))))
)

metrics.name: Average Time to Extend Job Offer

metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN (${offer_extended_events}))))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (

)

metrics.name: Number of Open Job Requisitions

metrics.name: Average Time Completed Prior To Effective Date
metrics.description: Determines how long before the effective date the record was created. A negative value means that the record was created retroactively.
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
(SELECT FIRST("Effective Date")) 
- 
(SELECT LAST("Created Date"))
)

metrics.name: Average Time for Employee to Resubmit Workflow Request
metrics.description: Counts the average time from when a workflow was rejected by HR until the employee resubmits a workflow request
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
 WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Personal Data Change WF Resubmitted'))) 
- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
 WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Personal Data Change WF Rejected'))))

metrics.name: Average Time to Approve Workflow Request
metrics.description: Counts the average time from the initiation of a workflow to change personal data by the employee to the approval of the workflow request by the HR department
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
 WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Personal Data Change WF Approved'))) 
- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
 WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Personal Data Change WF Initiated'))))

metrics.name: Average Time to Reject Workflow Request
metrics.description: Counts the average time from the initiation of a workflow to change personal data by the employee to the rejection of the workflow request by the HR department
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
 WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Personal Data Change WF Rejected'))) 
- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
 WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Personal Data Change WF Initiated'))))

metrics.name: Average Time Workflow Initiated Prior to Effective Date
metrics.description: Determines how long before the effective date the workflow request was initiated. A negative value means that the record was created retroactively.
metrics.signalFragment: AVG("Effective Date" - "Workflow Created Date")

metrics.name: Rate of Personal Data Changes Initiated by Employee
metrics.description: Determines the rate of cases with personal data changes initiated by the employee.
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM(
	(SELECT COUNT(CASE_ID) FILTER (
 	WHERE (EVENT_NAME IN ('Personal Data Change WF Initiated'))))) 
/ COUNT (CASE_ID) 
*100

metrics.name: Average number of reworks per case
metrics.description: Average number, per case, of events that appear at least twice
metrics.signalFragment: AVG((SELECT COUNT(event_name) - COUNT(DISTINCT event_name)))

metrics.name: Percentage of cases affected by rework
metrics.description: Number of cases affected by rework divided by the total number of cases

metrics.name: Percentage of events affected by rework
metrics.description: Number of events in the process that appear at least twice divided by the total number of events
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM(
(SELECT COUNT(event_name) - COUNT(DISTINCT event_name))
)
/
SUM((SELECT COUNT(event_name))) * 100

metrics.name: Average cycle time for cases affected by rework
metrics.description: Average cycle time calculated from the first to the last event for cases affected by rework

metrics.name: Net average cycle time spent on rework
metrics.description: Difference between the average cycle time of the cases that have any rework and the average cycle time of the whole process

metrics.name: Percentage of cases without any rework
metrics.description: Number of cases not affected by rework divided by the total number of cases

metrics.name: Fraction of total average cycle time spent on rework
metrics.description: Ratio between net average cycle time spent on rework and total average cycle time

metrics.name: Average Number of Contract Clause Types

	COUNT(1) FILTER (WHERE ${attribute_for_no_alternative_contract_clauses} > 0 ) +
	COUNT(1) FILTER (WHERE ${attribute_for_no_empty_contract_clauses} > 0 ) +
	COUNT(1) FILTER (WHERE ${attribute_for_no_fallback_contract_clauses} > 0 ) +

COUNT(case_id)

SUM(${attribute_for_no_preferred_contract_clauses})

(SUM(${attribute_for_no_alternative_contract_clauses}) +
SUM(${attribute_for_no_empty_contract_clauses}) +

	-

    	(WHERE event_name IN (${ptp_ecc_s4h_invoice_receipt_events})))
	) FILTER (
	WHERE (${ptp_ecc_s4h_late_payment_condition})
	AND ${ptp_ecc_s4h_invoice_clearing_date} IS NOT NULL
	)

metrics.description: Percentage of cases with reversed invoices
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES(${ptp_ecc_s4h_invoice_reversal_events})
	)
/ COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES ((${ptp_ecc_s4h_invoice_receipt_event_flow}))
	)
* 100

metrics.name: RFP savings vs baseline spend
metrics.description: RFP (Request for Proposal) awarded value compared to the baseline spend. Indicates how much money your organization allocated (or expected to spend, baseline) versus how much they actually spent within RFP events.
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM(
	(SELECT MAX("Baseline Spend of Sourcing Project") FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN (${rfp_creation_events})) 
        AND "Awarded Total Cost" > 0
        AND "Baseline Spend of Sourcing Project" > 0))
	-(SELECT SUM("Awarded Total Cost") FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN (${rfp_creation_events})) 
        AND "Awarded Total Cost" > 0
        AND "Baseline Spend of Sourcing Project" > 0))
)

metrics.name: Auction savings vs baseline spend
metrics.description: Auction awarded value compared to the baseline spend. Indicates how much money your organization allocated (or expected to spend, baseline) versus how much they actually spent within Auction events.
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM(
	(SELECT MAX("Baseline Spend of Sourcing Project") FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN (${auction_creation_events})) 
        AND "Awarded Total Cost" > 0
        AND "Baseline Spend of Sourcing Project"  > 0))
	-(SELECT SUM("Awarded Total Cost") FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN (${auction_creation_events})) 
        AND "Awarded Total Cost" > 0
        AND "Baseline Spend of Sourcing Project" > 0))
)

metrics.name: RFP savings vs historic spend
metrics.description: RFP (Request for Proposal) savings compared to historic spend. Indicates how much money your organization used to spend for this product/service (historic) versus how much they actually spent within RFP events.
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM(
	(SELECT SUM("Historic Total Cost") FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN (${rfp_creation_events})) 
        AND "Awarded Total Cost" > 0
        AND "Historic Total Cost" > 0))
	-(SELECT SUM("Awarded Total Cost") FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN (${rfp_creation_events})) 
        AND "Awarded Total Cost" > 0
        AND "Historic Total Cost" > 0))
)

metrics.name: Auction savings vs historic spend
metrics.description: Auction savings compared to historic spend. Indicates how much money your organization used to spend for this product/service (historic) versus how much they actually spent within Auction events.
metrics.signalFragment:

	(SELECT SUM("Historic Total Cost") FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN (${auction_creation_events})) 
        AND "Awarded Total Cost" > 0
        AND "Historic Total Cost" > 0))
	-(SELECT SUM("Awarded Total Cost") FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN (${auction_creation_events})) 
        AND "Awarded Total Cost" > 0
        AND "Historic Total Cost" > 0))
)

metrics.description: Number of awarded sourcing events with a single participant

metrics.name: Average supplier participation
metrics.description: Average supplier participation in sourcing events

metrics.name: Average sourcing project cycle time
metrics.description: Average duration of a sourcing project from creation to close
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN (${sourcing_project_closure_events}))))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN (${sourcing_project_creation_events}))))
   )

metrics.name: Average sourcing request conversion duration
metrics.description: Average time it takes to convert a sourcing request to a Sourcing Project
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN (${sourcing_project_creation_events}))))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN (${sourcing_request_creation_events}))))
   )

metrics.name: Sourcing request conversion rate
metrics.description: Percentage of Sourcing Requests that were converted to a Sourcing Project
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT BOOL_OR(event_name IN (${sourcing_project_creation_events}))))
/ COUNT(case_id)
* 100

metrics.name: SLA breach ratio on process level, based on SLA events
metrics.description: Percentage of cases where the SLA was breached, based on events related to SLA breaches
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT FIRST(event_name)
			WHERE event_name IN (${sla_breach_events})) IS NOT NULL)
/ COUNT(case_id)
* 100

metrics.name: Number of SLA breaches based on SLA events

metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT FIRST(event_name) 
			WHERE event_name IN (${sla_breach_events})) IS NOT NULL)

metrics.name: Average actual to target SLA ratio
metrics.description: Ratio between the average incident resolution duration to target SLA duration
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	((SELECT LAST(end_time) WHERE event_name IN (${sla_closure_events}))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time) WHERE event_name IN (${sla_creation_events})))
) / (DURATION ${target_sla_time})
*100

metrics.description: Percentage of incident resolutions that met their target
